name: Talonflame
evolution: Level 1 Fletchling, Level 5 Fletchinder, Level 9 Talonflame

passive.name: Gale Wings
passive.description: When the Pokemon is at high HP, its movement speed is increased.

basic attack.description: Becomes a boosted attack every third attack, causing damage to all opponents in range. Even if you leave the area after two normal attacks, the next attack is still boosted

base.name: Peck
base.description: Has the user fly toward an opposing Pokemon and attack three times.

upgrade.description: Also decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time when this move lands successfully.

upgrades.name: Flame Charge
upgrades.description: Flies in the designated direction cloaked in flame, attacking opposing Pokemon in the user's path. This also increases the user's movement speed.

upgrades.name: Aerial Ace
upgrades.description: Charges quickly towards a targeted Pokemon and increases the power of the next basic move.

base.name: Acrobatics
base.description: Has the user fly toward the designated area and attack multiple times. Allows the user to escape in a direction of their choice after using this move.

upgrade.description: Throws opposing Pokemon that area in its area of effect when this move lands successfully.

upgrades.name: Fly
upgrades.description: Flies up into the sky. Using this move again will cause the user to dive to the designated area and attack.

upgrades.name: Brave Bird
upgrades.description: Embodies itself in flames and suddenly flies to the targeted area, doing AOE damage. After hitting the target area, suffers recoil and reduces the cooldown of basic moves for a certain time.

unite.name: Flame Sweep
unite.description: Has the user perform an aerial somersault before charging forawrd, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in this move's path and {{shoving|knockback}} them.
